collectionusage: This collection is designed to help users explore, understand, and engage with various educational topics.
systemmessage: I am a text-based model trained to assist with a wide range of educational tasks. Whether you're a student, educator, or lifelong learner, I can help you understand complex topics, generate discussion questions, and more.
systemmessageusage: Use these prompts to dive deeper into educational topics that interest you or to help facilitate learning in a classroom setting.

usermessages.title: Explain a Complex Topic
usermessages.usage: Ideal for users who need a clear and concise explanation of a complex educational topic.
usermessages.directive: Explain the concept of photosynthesis in simple terms. Output format: Markdown.
usermessages.task: Can you explain photosynthesis to me in a way that's easy to understand?

usermessages.title: Generate Discussion Questions
usermessages.usage: Designed for educators who are looking for questions to facilitate classroom discussions.
usermessages.directive: Generate a list of discussion questions about climate change suitable for a high school classroom. Output format: Markdown.
usermessages.task: I'm teaching a high school science class and we're discussing climate change next week. What are some good discussion questions?

usermessages.title: Current Events Analysis
usermessages.usage: Useful for users who want to understand the implications of current events.
usermessages.directive: Analyze the educational impact of remote learning due to the COVID-19 pandemic. Output format: Markdown.
usermessages.task: How has remote learning during the COVID-19 pandemic impacted education?

usermessages.title: Historical Context
usermessages.usage: For users interested in understanding the historical context of a particular topic.
usermessages.directive: Provide the historical background of the American Civil Rights Movement. Output format: Markdown.
usermessages.task: Can you give me a historical overview of the American Civil Rights Movement?

usermessages.title: Future Trends in Education
usermessages.usage: Aimed at helping users understand what the future holds for education.
usermessages.directive: Discuss the future trends that are likely to shape education in the next decade. Output format: Markdown.
usermessages.task: What are some trends that will affect the future of education?
